title: A RESOLUTION APPROVING AND ADOPTING THE MUNICIPAL DISASTER RISK REDUCTION AND MANAGEMENT COUNCIL (MDRRMC) RESOLUTION NO. 2025-11 DATED OCTOBER 13, 2025 ENTITLED ‚ÄùRESOLUTION APPROVING THE FINANCIAL ASSISTANCE TO THE EARTHQUAKE HIT PROVINCES OF CEBU AND DAVAO ORIENTAL IN THE AMOUNT OF ONE HUNDRED THOUSAND PESOS (PHP 100,000.00) EACH THROUGH THE PHILIPPINE RED CROSS CHARGEABLE AGAINST THE GENERAL FUND OF THE MUNICIPAL GOVERNMENT OF LOS BANOS.
